body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. enchant creature with "guard duty"
2. wait to be attacted. 3. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? expect that creature will be unable to attack. Instead creature attacks. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.18. Windows 7 starter Please provide any additional information below.
author: [TANGENT1...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/112628616019840408658/)
title: Guard duty enchanted creatures can still attack

comments.body:
Thanks for taking time to file the report. This bug has been fixed in the current development build and will be released in 1.19. In the mean time, you can try out this development build which contains the fix, http://magarena.googlecode.com/files/Magarena_2623.exe

**Status:** Duplicate
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
